Class BarItemLabelColorRenderer

java.lang.Object
  org.jfree.chart.renderer.AbstractRenderer
      org.jfree.chart.renderer.category.AbstractCategoryItemRenderer
          org.jfree.chart.renderer.category.BarRenderer
              edu.sdsc.inca.consumer.BarItemLabelColorRenderer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, org.jfree.chart.LegendItemSource, org.jfree.chart.renderer.category.CategoryItemRenderer, org.jfree.util.PublicCloneable
public class BarItemLabelColorRenderer
extends org.jfree.chart.renderer.category.BarRenderer

A bar item label renderer class that changes the color of the label based the difference in values between bars.

Author:
Shava Smallen <ssmallen@sdsc.edu>
See Also:
Serialized Form

getItemLabelPaint

public java.awt.Paint getItemLabelPaint(int row,
                                        int col)
Overrides super classes function to return a per item label text color

Specified by:
getItemLabelPaint in interface org.jfree.chart.renderer.category.CategoryItemRenderer
Overrides:
getItemLabelPaint in class org.jfree.chart.renderer.AbstractRenderer
Parameters:
row - The row index of the item
col - The col index of the item
Returns:
A color of text to use when printing the item label
